subject: Re: [junit] Re: Is it possible to write tests that delete ONLY the data they create?
msgSnippet: Thanks for all the replies.  I see the way forward. CLEAN_INSERT and DELETE_ALL  with a Db that has no data in it.   Lowell Gilbertson lowellgilbertson
